errors.CONECTION_NO_WORD_ENTERED: Error: Enter at least one word to continue
errors.EMBEDDING_NO_WORD_PROVIDED: Error: First you most enter a word!
errors.EMBEDDING_WORD_OOV: Error: The word '{}' is not in the vocabulary!
errors.BIASEXPLORER_NOT_ENOUGH_WORD_2_KERNELS: At least one word should be in the to diagnose list, bias 1 list and bias 2 list
errors.BIASEXPLORER_NOT_ENOUGH_WORD_4_KERNELS: To plot with 4 spaces, you must enter at least one word in all lists
errors.RANKSENTS_NO_SENTENCE_PROVIDED: Error: You most enter a sentence!
errors.RANKSENTS_NO_MASK_IN_SENTENCE: Error: The entered sentence needs to contain a ' * ' in order to predict the word!
errors.RANKSENTS_TOO_MANY_MASKS_IN_SENTENCE: Error: The sentence entered must contain only one ' * '!
errors.RANKSENTS_TOKENIZER_MAX_TOKENS_REACHED: Error: The sentence has more than {} tokens!
errors.CROWS-PAIRS_BAD_FORMATTED_SENTENCE: Error: The sentence Nº {} does not have the correct format!
errors.CROWS-PAIRS_MANDATORY_SENTENCE_MISSING: Error: The sentence Nº{} can not be empty!
errors.WORD2CONTEXT_WORDS_OR_SET_MISSING: Error: Word not entered and/or interest set(s) not selected!
